content.question: The Great Compromise of 1787 resulted in

choices.label: a final settlement of the question of slavery
a renewal of the Articles of Confederation
the creation of a national bank
a system of political representation for the states in the federal government
a border agreement between the United States and Canada

content.answer: a system of political representation for the states in the federal government

topic.text: 3.8: The Constitutional Convention and Debates over Ratification

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
